# Hougang

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(extrafont)
```

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
hougangspaces<-read_csv(here::here('irpdata/Hougang19052020.csv'))
```

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
hougangspaces<-hougangspaces %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c('lon', 'lat'))

st_crs(hougangspaces)<-"+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs"
```

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(hougangspaces)+tm_symbols(size = 2,shape ="Category", col= "Type of Space", legend.hist = TRUE)+tm_legend(outside=TRUE)
```
